titleInfo.title: Political cartoon, "The Nation's Champion Recovery Producer"

mods.abstract: A cow symbolizing the AAA (Agricultural Adjustment Act) stands by milk cans touting the success of the program. The first can is labeled, "Increased Farm Income," and the middle one is labeled, "Business and Industrial Gains through Re-Establishment of Agriculture's Purchasing Power." The cow feeds on the processing tax used to help pay the farmers. An obese industrialist, pointing out the cow to a man representing the Supreme Court, says, "I want her killed so we won't have to feed her."
